text: The Cishan Wude Hall () is a former martial arts training center in Cishan District, Kaohsiung, Taiwan. It was built in 1934 after being proposed by the Japanese "in the spirit of Bushido". The hall was constructed in a traditional Japanese-style temple with strong Tang Dynasty-style temples style. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Taiwan ==References== Category:1934 establishments in Taiwan Category:Buildings and structures in Kaohsiung Category:Martial art halls in Taiwan Category:Sports venues completed in 1934
title: Cishan Wude Hall
